english.segment1: Expectations of actions  that conform. Foreign beliefs  put in position to be killed. You have to go  you have to fight. Theres no one else thats capable. No one else would even dare
english.segment2: Put your life on the line without a word. Silent and stealth / Just like you were trained to kill
english.segment3: Your hands are tied / Youve been compromised. As the bullets rain down on your hide
english.segment4: Twenty yards and counting / The ememy rears his head. Black eyes glaring hate / In his heart
english.segment5: Blood and sweat mixed with earth / Bloody mess, stench of death. Blood and sweat mixed with earth / Searing flesh is what youre worth
english.segment6: Your hands are tied / Youve been compromised. As the bullets rain down on your hide. Your hands are tied / Youve been compromised. As the bullets rain down on your hide
